channel.title: Openwisp on HizkiFW's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Openwisp on HizkiFW's blog

item.title: GCI With OpenWISP
item.description: Over the past month or so, I’ve been participating in an online programming competition called Google Code-In. The competition features 25 organizations, each of which has their own set of tasks for the students to complete. Out of all of them, I chose OpenWISP. It was initially a random choice, since I didn’t really know which one to join, but I eventually stuck with them because of the really warm and supportive community.
